products.name: Popcorn
products.facts: ["Popcorn is a whole grain and is a good source of fiber.","Popcorn kernels contain moisture inside that turns to steam when heated, causing them to pop.","Popcorn is a low-calorie snack when air-popped and without added fats or sugars.","The United States is the largest producer of popcorn in the world."]

products.name: Powdered Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters, Plant-based pâtés
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, Kosher, No GMOs, Vegan, Non GMO project, Vegan Action, en:certified-gluten-free
products.facts: ["Made from roasted peanuts that are pressed to remove most of the oil, resulting in a lower fat content than traditional peanut butter.","Contains no added sugars or artificial ingredients, making it a healthier alternative.","The production process typically uses sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","Rich in protein and fiber, providing a nutritious option for various diets."]

products.name: Great Grains Cereal Blueberry Morning
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, en:cereal-flakes
products.labels: No GMOs, Non GMO project, 50% or more of the grain is whole grain
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats, wheat, and barley.","Contains real blueberries for natural flavor and antioxidants.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","No artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring high quality ingredients."]

products.name: Plain
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Skyrs, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Plain - null is made from 100% organic cotton, ensuring a sustainable source of material.","The production process of Plain - null minimizes water usage, making it eco-friendly.","Plain - null is designed to be biodegradable, reducing its environmental impact after disposal.","Quality checks are implemented at every stage of production to ensure durability and longevity of the product."]

products.labels: Viande Française, Viande Bovine Française, Fabriqué en France
products.facts: ["1 kg is a unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI), defined as the mass of the International Prototype of the Kilogram made of platinum-iridium.","The material used for the prototype is highly resistant to oxidation and corrosion, ensuring its longevity and stability over time.","In terms of ecology, the production of materials for weights can involve significant energy consumption and resource use, impacting the environment.","Quality control for 1 kg weights involves precise calibration and adherence to international standards to ensure accuracy and reliability in measurements."]

products.name: Piri Piri Molho
products.facts: ["Piri Piri Molho is made from a blend of chili peppers, garlic, and vinegar, offering a spicy and tangy flavor.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, using recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","The sauce is produced without artificial preservatives, ensuring a natural and high-quality product.","Piri Piri Molho is often made using locally sourced ingredients, supporting sustainable agricultural practices."]

products.name: Agromonte, ready cherry tomato sauce
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Fruits and vegetables based foods,Condiments,Vegetables based foods,Vegetables,Sauces,Tomatoes and their products,Tomato sauces,Tomatoes,Groceries
products.labels: No gluten, Made in Italy, en:vegan
products.facts: ["Made with 100% Italian cherry tomatoes for authentic flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring a natural product.","The tomatoes are sourced from sustainable farms, promoting ecological farming practices.","Packaged in recyclable materials, supporting environmental sustainability."]

products.name: Vegetables Broth
products.labels: Sin gluten,Sin OMG,100% natural,FSC,FSC Mixto,Punto Verde,Sin huevo,Sin aromas,Sin lactosa,Proyecto no OGM
products.facts: ["Made from a variety of fresh vegetables, herbs, and spices.","Typically low in calories and fat, making it a healthy choice.","Often packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Can be used as a base for soups, stews, and sauces, enhancing flavor without meat."]

products.name: Premier protein
products.facts: ["Premier Protein contains 30 grams of protein per 11 fl oz serving, sourced from milk protein concentrate and whey protein isolate.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact.","Premier Protein is low in sugar, containing only 1 gram per serving, making it a healthier option for protein supplementation.","The product is gluten-free and contains no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring high quality and safety for consumers."]

products.name: Oreo Mini
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Biscuits and cakes,Biscuits,Chocolate biscuits,Filled biscuits,Chocolate sandwich cookies
products.facts: ["Oreo Mini cookies are made with high-quality ingredients including cocoa and real vanilla.","The packaging for Oreo Mini is designed to be recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Oreo Mini contains no artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a more natural taste.","The cookies are produced in facilities that adhere to strict quality control standards to guarantee freshness."]

products.name: Granola Minis Chocolate Chip
products.ingredients_text: pure gluten free oats, chocolate chips, cane sugar, cocoa butter, unsweetened chocolate, sunflower oil, sweet cane syrup, agave syrup, brown rice crisps, dried apple pieces, inulin, brown rice syrup, natural flavor, vegetable extracts, spinach, broccoli, carrots, tomatoes, beets, shiitake, cardamom, brown rice syrup, salt, organic
products.labels: No gluten, Organic, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats for a nutritious base.","Contains real chocolate chips for a delicious flavor.","Packaged in a resealable bag to reduce waste.","Free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring quality ingredients."]
